question: 片言
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>One sided</kanji> <kanji>say</kanji>ing things means you don't know both sides of the language, causing you to speak in <vocabulary>broken language</vocabulary>, for example speaking <vocabulary>a few words</vocabulary> in <vocabulary>broken Japanese</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>broken English</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the reading you learned for <ja>片</ja> and the <ja>こと</ja> of <ja>言葉</ja>.
